document_data.mainbody: Vauge tea was a beverage made by steeping parts of the vauge plant in hot water. It was available in Khôltar, south Faerûn, at the popular blurdren (food counter) called Munsrums Ready Ladle near the north gate of the city, circa the Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR. Vauge tea was free to customers who brought their own cup, or 1 cp if served in one of Munsrums dented metal cups.
